title: What I Like
subtle: Personal Recount (fiction), 24 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR60L
description: On a rainy day, a girl sits by the window and thinks about what she likes to see and do outside. The repetitive text, high-frequency words, and illustrations provide support for beginning readers.
meta: bees, birds, flowers, outside, slide, swing
Use the reading strategy of visualizing to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Nouns : Recognize and understand that nouns are naming words
High-Frequency Words : Recognize and write the high-frequency word I

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
